The claim was published on a website kno: com, which is not known for publishing fake news. This suggests that the claim may have been seen as credible by some readers.
The website SitSetDigital: com quickly deleted the misinformation about Hawking and issued an apology, stating that the article was a hoax. This indicates that the website acknowledged the false nature of the claim and took steps to rectify the situation.
The expert: s verdict also mentions that the claim was published amidst a slew of reports alleging sexual assault by prominent individuals in late 2017. This context highlights the potential for false claims to be made during a time when there was heightened public attention on such issues.
